ygData.messageBody:
We as Paladins should be thankful we are not nearly as messed up as other
classes are. Warriors max out at an attack level that is the same as our
own, and have a weapon that is supposadly the best that has no damage
improvemt over a weapon taken from a lvl 25ish mob. We know at least with
Fiery Avenger, we can do well over 200 hp of damage per hit not including
the spell, inferno shock which hits for another 150. The Ghoulsbane still
has a better ratio than the Short Sword of the Yklesh. ANd Ghoulsbane is
somewhat easy to get. The Brilliant Sword of Faith is a reward you get for
killing Sir Lucan, the fallen Paladin of the Militia fame. I is not the
greates of weapons, but it has as good of a ratio as a Giant Zweihander and
50 extra mana, and you dont have to kill an Innocent (Karg) for it. The only
Tweaks I think A paladin should get is the ability to do a Full ressurect,
not just a revive, and Healing at 22 instead of 30, because by the time we
hit 22, minor healing dosnt cut it anylonger. We are the the most powerful
Melee Class in the game due to the fact of LOH and Our healing spells, which
gives us more hp than a Monk and lets us tank for much longer than a
Warrior, we can also at later levels us the best weapons and armor. Brad
does need to make the quests eaiser, and needs to fix them immediatly, or at
least give better clues, I mean I have camped for Jojounga for the High Elf
Paladin quest now for 2 nights, And he has not spawned, which is Quite
annoying because during that time 2 bashers have found me and caused me to
lose a level. I do not agree with the Paladin exp penalty, but I believe
shadowknights should get a larger penalty because they can summon a pet and
their dd spells cannot be resisted. Just my own personal feelings on this
issue.

Lady Dame Laurana Highwind
